title: What about OCE?
body: Who from oce want to play in the PBE and test out new reoworks, skins etc. I certainly do. But for some odd reason oce players can't partake in the Public Beta Environment (PBE). I would like to know why oce players cant partake in PBE.

replies.body:
Hey there,

PBE signup is currently only open for players with a level 30 account on either NA, EUW or EUNE.
I thought it was just a PBE server that anyone could get onto, I have 2 friends with PBE accounts.
